name: Tomb Quest (Rashidalmasoud)
description:
Tomb Quest is the adventure game of the year!

 Set out on a journey to raid the most ancient tomb there is, the tomb of King Zoob. 

Find your way to Zoob mountain in one piece, and make sure not to get lost in the dark forest on the way. 

Mount Zoob was once an active volcano but now hosts a secret labyrinth buried deep underneath. Within the labyrinth you will find the tomb of king Zoob, which rumors have it, is filled with great treasure. Be sure to avoid the beast within,  and try to look for all the treasures. Hurry, the your adventure inside mount Zoob awaits!
